verbose_text: Among these, the stimulation of NANOG and KLF2 expression in 2 inhibitors (PD0325901 and CHIR99021) + Leukemia inhibitory factor (2i+ Lif) conditions (inhibition of mitogen activated protein extracellular signal regulated kinase [ERK] and glycogen synthase kinase-3 beta) and subsequent restriction of protein kinase C (PKC) activity yielded hESCs with a close resemblance to the human blastocyst.
